form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP, Form N-600 ( (Rev. 5–15–62)

full_text: LAFAYETTE BLDG., 5th & CHESTNUT Sr PHHADE:PHIA FE STAMP 6, PA. Form approved. Budget Bureau No. 43-R105.8. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE FEE PAID No. 40-20 Irai gration and Naturalization APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE Philadelphia, Pa. OF CITIZENSHIP Under Sec. 341 of the Immigration and Nationality Act Date 8/26/64 Verified by here Take or mail this application to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE (Print or type) Herman Getz Date 11-63 8-26-64 nee (Name) (Maiden name, if any) 429 E.Eleanor.ST (Apartment number, Street address, and, if appropriate, "in care of" ALIEN REGISTRATION Indez Checked Mr Phila. 20 P2 No. A13995582 File No (City) (County) (State) To : 8-27-20 See Instructions on Pages 5 and 6 By : I hereby apply to the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization for a certificate showing that I am a citizen of the United States of America. (1) I was born in odessa Russia 6 3 03 on (2) My personal description is: sexmale (City) ; complexion (State or country) ; color of eyes Brown. (Month) color (Day) of hair (Year) Grey ; height 5 feet 8' inches; weight 210 pounds; visible distinctive marks none Marital status: 1904 NowPown NY Single; Married; Divorced; Widow(er). (3) I arrived in the United States at on 9/2/04 under the name Hyman ISRAO/ for by and means State) of BelGRAVIA (Month) (Day) (Year) (Name of ship or other means of arrival) on U.S. Passport No. issued to me at on (Month) (Day) (Year) (4) Fill in this block only if you arrived in the United States before July 1, 1924. (a) My last permanent foreign residence was odessa Russia (City) (Country) (b) I took the ship or other conveyance to the United States at father(solomon) (City) of I was coming to at Philadelphia-Pa@ (Country) (Name of person in the United States) (City and State where this person was living) (d) I traveled to the United States with mother (celia) dsester MalhaChore (Names of passengers or relatives with whom you traveled, and their relationship to you, if any) (5) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No. If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED To RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES THAT 10 (6) I filed a declaration of intention to become a citizen of the United States or a petition for naturalization. (have) (have not) (If "have" give full details on a separate sheet of paper this size and attach it, showing question number.) TO THE APPLICANT.-Do not write between the double lines below. Continue on next page. 07 ARRIVAL RECORDS EXAMINED ARRIVAL RECORD FOUND Card index Place Date Index books Name Manifests Manner Marital status Age (Signature of person making search) Form N-600 (Rev. 5-15-62) (1) STATISTICS
